TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit CodeDomDesignerLoader extends System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader implements class System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationService, class System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.INameCreationService
Public MustInherit Class CodeDomDesignerLoader Inherits BasicDesignerLoader Implements IDesignerSerializationService, INameCreationService

summary.span: 提供用于实现基于 CodeDOM 的设计器加载程序的基类。

span.span: Provides the base class for implementing a CodeDOM-based designer loader.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个抽象类，提供完善的设计器加载程序基于代码文档对象模型 (CodeDOM)。 is an abstract class that provides a full designer loader based on the Code Document Object Model (CodeDOM). 需要提供 CodeDOM 分析器和生成器和类型解析服务。You provide the CodeDOM parser and generator, and a type resolution service.

permission.span: 对系统资源的完全访问权限。

span.span: for full access to system resources.
Demand values: , .
Associated state:

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected MustOverride ReadOnly Property CodeDomProvider As CodeDomProvider

summary.span: 获取此设计器加载程序将使用的 。

span.span: Gets the this designer loader will use.

value.span: 此设计器加载程序将使用的

span.span: The this designer loader will use

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设计器加载程序不会分析或从返回生成代码，但它使用提供程序以获取以便它可以用于验证名称创建服务中的标识符。The designer loader does not parse or generate code from the returned , but it does use the provider to obtain an that it can use to validate identifiers in the name-creation service. 设计器加载程序还将检查以查看它是否实现接口。The designer loader will also check the to see if it implements the interface. 有关分析或生成代码的详细信息，请参阅和方法。For more information on parsing or generating code, see the and methods.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed

summary.span: 释放 类使用的资源。

span.span: Releases the resources used by the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法中删除添加的服务方法。The method removes services added by the method. 在完成使用 后，应调用 。Call when you are finished using the . 方法使 处于不可用状态。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 在调用，必须释放对所有引用以便垃圾回收器才能回收的内存，占用。After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 有关详细信息，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 每次释放对 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Initialize() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化服务。

span.span: Initializes services.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表描述了可替换服务将添加到服务容器。The following table describes the replaceable services that the adds to the service container. |术语Term|定义Definition| |----------|----------------| ||提供用于创建对象的名称的语义。Provides semantics for creating names of objects. 服务使用 CodeDOM 提供程序的接口可创建是有效的语言标识符的名称。The service uses the CodeDOM provider’s interface to create names that are valid identifiers for the language. 此外，该名称创建服务支持空名称。In addition, the name creation service supports empty names. 在序列化过程中，从空名称应被视为临时的本地变量上。Empty names should be interpreted as temporary local variables during serialization.| ||允许其他对象序列化为二进制对象组件的组。Allows other objects to serialize a group of components into a binary object. 功能，如复制和粘贴或撤消和重做最常使用此服务。This service is most often used by features such as copy and paste or undo and redo. 类提供了基于创建对象的 CodeDOM 树的设计器的序列化服务。The class provides a designer serialization service that is based on creating CodeDOM trees for objects.| ||此服务会替换作为将二进制对象组件序列化为一种方法。This service replaces as a means to serialize components to a binary object.| 有关可替换和非可替换服务的详细信息，请参阅。For details on replaceable and non-replaceable services, see .

exception.span: 尚未初始化，或设计器加载程序不支持类型解析服务，该服务是 CodeDom 序列化所必需的。

span.span: The has not been initialized, or the designer loader did not supply a type resolution service, which is required for CodeDom serialization.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance bool IsReloadNeeded() cil managed
Protected Overrides Function IsReloadNeeded () As Boolean

summary.span: 返回一个值，指示重新加载是否是必需的。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether a reload is required.

returns.span: 如果 决定重新加载是必需的，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the decides a reload is required; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法检查是否存在接口。The method checks for the presence of the interface on the . 提供程序将重新分析 CodeDOM 树并将传递到生成的分析树方法。The provider will reparse the CodeDOM tree and pass the resulting parse tree to the method. 如果此方法返回`false`，不会重新加载设计器。If this method returns `false`, the designer will not be reloaded.

exception.span: 该语言不为此文件提供代码分析器；此文件类型可能不支持设计器。

span.span: The language did not provide a code parser for this file; this file type may not support a designer.

exception.span: 可以设计该类，但它不是文件中的第一个类，否则将无法设计此文件中的任何类，进而导致无法为此文件显示设计器。

span.span: The class can be designed, but it is not the first class in the file, or the designer could not be shown for this file because none of the classes within it can be designed.

Protected MustOverride Function Parse () As CodeCompileUnit

summary.span: 分析文本或其他永久存储区并返回 。

span.span: Parses the text or other persistent storage and returns a .
A resulting from a parse operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法调用时需要分析的源代码。The method is called when the needs to parse the source code. 通过派生类，必须指定源代码位置和格式。The source code location and format must be specified by deriving classes.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void PerformFlush(class System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager manager) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub PerformFlush (manager As IDesignerSerializationManager)

param.name: manager
param.span: 要从中请求序列化程序的 。

span.span: The from which to request the serializer.

summary.span: 请求设计器的根组件的序列化。

span.span: Requests serialization of the root component of the designer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法获取根的根组件的设计器，并在调用序列化程序进行序列化组件。The method obtains the root for the root component of the designer and invokes the serializer to serialize the component. 如果此操作的结果是，然后集成与现有 CodeDOM 树。If the result of this operation is a , then integrates the with the existing CodeDOM tree. 结果是具有匹配的成员和语句替换为原始的 CodeDOM 树。The result is the original CodeDOM tree with matching members and statements replaced. 最后，调用抽象方法来保存此 CodeDOM 树。Finally, calls the abstract method to save this CodeDOM tree. 如果序列化的根设计器组件不会导致，然后不执行任何进一步操作。If the serialization of the root designer component does not result in a , then does nothing further. > [!IMPORTANT] > 它负责的调用方以确保 CodeDOM 来自受信任的源。It is the responsibility of the caller to ensure that a CodeDOM originates from a trusted source. 接受来自不受信任方一个 CodeDOM 对象，则可能导致该方运行恶意代码。Accepting a CodeDOM object from an untrusted party could allow that party to run malicious code. 当刷新到文件 CodeDOM，框架将运行 CodeDOM 对象和所提供对象的序列化的内容中的代码。When flushing a CodeDOM into a file, the framework will run code represented by the CodeDOM object and the serialized content of the object as provided.

exception.span: 该语言不为此文件提供代码分析器；此文件类型可能不支持设计器。

span.span: The language did not provide a code parser for this file; this file type may not support a designer.

exception.span: 可以设计该类，但它不是文件中的第一个类，否则将无法设计此文件中的任何类，进而导致无法为此文件显示设计器。

span.span: The class can be designed, but it is not the first class in the file, or the designer could not be shown for this file because none of the classes within it can be designed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void PerformLoad(class System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager manager) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub PerformLoad (manager As IDesignerSerializationManager)

param.name: manager
param.span: 要从中请求序列化程序的 。

span.span: The from which to request the serializer.

summary.span: 分析来自 CodeDOM 提供程序的代码。

span.span: Parses code from a CodeDOM provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法获取从 CodeDOM 提供程序，并将其代码。The method obtains an from the CodeDOM provider and parses the code. 在文件中找到的第一个类时，，获取根数据类型，并调用序列化程序进行反序列化的数据类型。 locates the first class in the file, obtains a root for the data type, and then invokes the serializer to deserialize the data type. 假定此过程将创建中的所有必要组件的属性。 assumes that this process will create all necessary components in the of the property. 最后，调用替换它传递到 CodeDOM 序列化程序的类型的完全限定名称的方法。Finally, calls the method with the fully qualified name of the type it passed to the CodeDOM serializer. > [!IMPORTANT] > 它负责的调用方以确保 CodeDOM 来自受信任的源。It is the responsibility of the caller to ensure that a CodeDOM originates from a trusted source. 接受来自不受信任方一个 CodeDOM 对象，则可能导致该方运行恶意代码。Accepting a CodeDOM object from an untrusted party could allow that party to run malicious code. 当加载到设计图面 CodeDOM，框架将运行 CodeDOM 对象和所提供对象的序列化的内容中的代码。When loading a CodeDOM into the design surface, the framework will run code represented by the CodeDOM object and the serialized content of the object as provided.

exception.span: 该语言不为此文件提供代码分析器；此文件类型可能不支持设计器。

span.span: The language did not provide a code parser for this file; this file type may not support a designer.

exception.span: 可以设计该类，但它不是文件中的第一个类，否则将无法设计此文件中的任何类，进而导致无法为此文件显示设计器。

span.span: The class can be designed, but it is not the first class in the file, or the designer could not be shown for this file because none of the classes within it can be designed.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected MustOverride ReadOnly Property TypeResolutionService As ITypeResolutionService

summary.span: 获取要与此设计器加载程序一起使用的类型解析服务。

span.span: Gets the type resolution service to be used with this designer loader.

value.span: CodeDOM 序列化程序在解析类型时将使用的 。

span.span: An that the CodeDOM serializers will use when resolving types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 自动将此添加到服务容器时调用方法。The automatically adds this to the service container when the method is invoked. 在许多方案中为可选类型解析服务时，它是必要条件代码解释因为源的代码包含类型名称，但没有程序集引用。While the type resolution service is optional in many scenarios, it is required for code interpretation because source code contains type names, but no assembly references.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Write(class System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit unit) cil managed
Protected MustOverride Sub Write (unit As CodeCompileUnit)

span.span: The to be persisted.

summary.span: 将编译单元更改写入永久存储区。

span.span: Writes compile-unit changes to persistent storage.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法保存到持久存储。The method saves a to persistent storage. 派生类负责调用上要保存代码的相应文本编写器。The deriving class is responsible for invoking the on the appropriate text writer to save the code. 确保 CodeDOM 对象传递给是从检索到的对象的相同实例，序列化过程不得不对代码进行更改的情况除外。The ensures that the CodeDOM objects that are passed to are the same instances of objects that were retrieved from , except in cases where the serialization process had to make changes to the code. 这样，优化的设计器加载程序存储中的其他数据的代码元素的属性。This allows an optimized designer loader to store additional data in the property of code elements. 此数据将会期间可用的序列化过程中不能替代的任何元素的方法。This data will be available during the method for any elements that were not replaced by the serialization process.
